name: pNetwork
public_notice: Eidoo (EDO) has been upgraded to pNetwork (PNT), https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/pnetwork/. For more information on the token upgrade, please read https://en.cryptonomist.ch/blog/eidoo/the-edo-to-pnt-upgrade-what-you-need-to-know-updated/

description.en: pNetwork is the heartbeat of cross-chain composability. As the governance network of the pTokens system, it enables the seamless movement of assets across blockchains.
